DOC.detailed_description: Structure : Single center , parallel group , single-blind , randomize study There three treatment group , two group receive different , cumulative dose Grass MATA MPL third group receive placebo . Duration : The duration study screen final visit treatment expect approximately 7 week . There telephone follow 1 , 3 , 6 12 month treatment .
